javax.tv.media
Class MediaSelectEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--javax.tv.media.MediaSelectEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MediaSelectFailedEvent, MediaSelectSucceededEvent
public abstract class MediaSelectEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

MediaSelectEvent is the base class of events sent to MediaSelectListener instances.

See Also:
MediaSelectListener, Serialized Form
